title: User guide update on working with XML updates
description:
I have added some additional information to the user guide in repository:
  https://github.com/apache/lucene-solr/pull/303

this covers info about:

	grouping XML commands with the <update> element
	more effective way of working with curl for large files - the original approach described in the guide with --data-binary results in curl out of memory errors for large files being uploaded
